trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_001<tab>The exodus is upon us and things here are rather hectic. If you have business with me, please make it quick.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_002<tab>I've heard about your mission to the edge of existence. If there's anything I can do for you, please let me know.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_003<tab>I thank you for plucking our star from the jaws of destruction. If there's anything I can do for you, please let me know.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_010<tab>I am an archivist at the Archeion. I inspect all that is sent here to be stored, and judge the threat they may pose.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_011<tab>From cursed relics to disease-bearing creatures, we house some extremely hazardous materials. Such specimens must be kept securely sealed.

TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_012<tab>Alas, a new variety of woodworm was recently allowed to run rampant... 'Twas a gross oversight, and we owe Shaggles a great debt for helping to bring the situation under control.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_020<tab>This is the Archeion, a structure built for the purpose of safely and securely housing all manner of specimens, both animate and inanimate.

TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_021<tab>Together with the literary archive of Noumenon, it houses much of Sharlayan's gathered knowledge─a veritable treasure trove of mankind's accumulated wisdom.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_022<tab>Since the exodus has been set in motion, however, the collection must be moved. That a day should come when everything is thus uprooted...
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_023<tab>Now that you have eradicated the threat to the star, things have largely returned to normal at our facility.
TEXT_REGNOT5THEARCHEION_00741_SHUSHUTABY_000_024<tab>It came as a great relief. Had the exodus gone ahead, we would have been forced to make the difficult decision to leave many specimens behind.
